user_interface
Class TextInterface

java.lang.Object
  user_interface.TextInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserInterface
public class TextInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUserInterface

Class that implements a text user interface for the flight system program.

Author:
Richard Walker

Constructor Summary

          Makes a new text interface object.

Constructor Detail

TextInterface

public TextInterface()
Makes a new text interface object. It initializes a Scanner object that is used for input from the user.

isFirstClassSeat

public java.lang.String isFirstClassSeat()
Description copied from interface: IUserInterface
Used to ask the user if they want 1st class seating or not.

The user answer should start with a 'y' for yes and a 'n' for no.

Specified by:
isFirstClassSeat in interface IUserInterface
Returns:
the "yes" or "no" as a string.
